message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $60.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but $60 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate the compromise, but $90 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $70, but that's my final offer.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  $70 is still quite low, but I'm willing to accept $85. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $85 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $82.50. This is my final offer.
